message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm asking for $22,000 to start negotiations.
Alice, while I appreciate your offer, $22,000 is far beyond my budget.  I'm interested in this product, but I can only offer $10,000 at this time.
Bob, thanks for your interest. I understand your position, but $10,000 is significantly less than what I'm willing to accept.  Could you do $18,000?
Alice, I'm still interested, but $18,000 is still a bit too high for me.  How about we split the difference and go with $14,000?
